decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive plays with a mix of creatures and spells to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. By including Jegantha as a companion, the deck gains access to additional mana fixing. The deck also utilizes Leylines and a variety of lands to ensure a diverse mana base. The combination of creatures like Scion of Draco, Nishoba Brawler, Wild Nacatl, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, along with spells like Tribal Flames and Lightning Bolt, allows for a fast-paced and powerful offensive strategy. Stubborn Denial provides protection against removal spells.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by using a combination of counter spells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler. It also utilizes cards like Leyline Binding and Solitude to control the board and protect its own life total. The deck is able to generate advantage through card draw with cards like Expressive Iteration and Wrenn and Six, while also having a versatile removal suite with Prismatic Ending and Lightning Bolt. The inclusion of Omnath, Locus of Creation provides a strong win condition and allows the deck to close out games quickly.

The deck revolves around using Amulet of Vigor and bounce lands like Simic Growth Chamber to generate extra mana and play Primeval Titan early. The goal is to assemble the combo pieces quickly, utilizing The One Ring to tutor key lands like the powerful Urza's Saga. With enough mana and lands in play, the deck can efficiently ramp into lethal Valakut triggers or overwhelm opponents with hasty Primeval Titans. The synergy between bounce lands, Amulet of Vigor, and powerful land tutors allows the deck to quickly establish a dominant board presence and win the game through explosive combos.

The main concept of this deck is to effectively mill the opponent's library through a combination of cards that force the opponent to mill cards whenever certain conditions are met, such as Fractured Sanity and Glimpse the Unthinkable, along with using cards like Hedron Crab and Archive Trap to mill cards directly. The deck also includes cards like Drown in the Loch and Fatal Push to control the opponent's board and disrupt their game plan. Ultimately, the goal is to mill the opponent's entire library and win the game through deck depletion.

Control the game by using powerful spells to counter and remove threats while manipulating the opponent's hand size and options. Use cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The One Ring is a key card that can give you a huge advantage in the late game, while also providing utility throughout the match. Utilize a mix of counterspells, removal, and card draw to maintain control and outvalue your opponent. Use lands like Misty Rainforest and Flooded Strand to fix your mana and ensure smooth plays throughout the game.

This deck focuses on aggressively utilizing The Underworld Cookbook to generate card advantage and fuel the graveyard. By combining powerful threats like Tarmogoyf and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer with versatile cards like Mishra's Bauble and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent and disrupt their game plan. With the help of Urza's Saga and Ovalchase Daredevil, the deck can quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure a fast victory. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an extra layer of consistency and flexibility to the deck.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Indomitable Creativity card to cheat out powerful creatures and combo pieces onto the battlefield, such as Archon of Cruelty. The deck also incorporates various spells and lands to support the combo strategy, along with cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Leyline Binding for added versatility and control. The inclusion of cards like Wrenn and Six and Teferi, Time Raveler help with card advantage and disruption, while cards like Lightning Bolt provide additional removal and reach. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with unexpected plays and creative combos.
